text: Tashinkyo no on'na to wa, ka no on'na ga shinja ni naru made wa kekkon shite wa naranai. Tatoe anata gata ga kiniitte ite mo, tashinkyo no on'na yori wa shinko no aru on'nadorei ga masaru. Mata tashinkyo no otoko ga shinja ni naru made wa, anata gata no joshi o kare-ra ni totsuga sete wa naranai. Tatoe anata gata no kiniitte ite mo, tashinkyo no otoko yori wa shinko aru dorei no kata ga katte iru. Korera no mono wa, shinja o goka ni izanau. Daga arra wa kan'yo ni tsumi o yurusa re, rakuen ni yobiire rareru. Mata hitobito ni, kare no shirushi o meiji sa reru. Osoraku kare-ra wa hansei surudearou
